name: BLOCKLAND (itch) (TTurkey)
description: You are a little block, who is really hungry for some pizza, but you must traverse blockland in order to get to the pizzarea. Jump, climb, break blocks, use levers, and shoot projectiles to make your way through each level, there is 5 in total (plus a hidden one!). There are a variety of enemies, like the yellow and blue smilies, skulls, and even slices of pizza. Will you get through and get the pizza you crave?
